timeline.message: initial commit wssecurity cxf and utils.common fat
initial commit cxf fat migration, and other fixes
add java permissions and few files resmoved
update web.xml inside sample client war -servlet mapping

timeline.author: arunavemulapalli
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,96 @@
+#*******************************************************************************
+# Copyright (c) 2019 IBM Corporation and others.
+# All rights reserved. This program and the accompanying materials

timeline.author: arunavemulapalli
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,32 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
+<!--   
+   Change History:
+   Date        UserId         Description
+   09/07/2012  syed           New CXF Web service
+-->
+
+<web-app version="3.0" xmlns="http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/javaee"
+         xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
+         xsi:schemaLocation="http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/javaee 
+         http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/javaee/web-app_3_0.xsd">
+    <display-name>cxfclient</display-name>
+
+    <servlet>
+        <servlet-name>cxfclient</servlet-name>
+        <display-name>cxfclient</display-name>
+        <description>CXF NoWssec Service Client</description>
+        <servlet-class>com.ibm.ws.wssecurity.fat.cxfclient.CxfNoWssecSvcClient</servlet-class>
+        <load-on-startup>1</load-on-startup>
+    </servlet>
+
+    <servlet-mapping>
+        <servlet-name>cxfclient</servlet-name>
+        <url-pattern>/CxfNoWssecSvcClient</url-pattern>
+    </servlet-mapping>
+
+    <session-config>
+        <session-timeout>60</session-timeout>
+    </session-config>
+
+</web-app>
+

timeline.author: arunavemulapalli
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,32 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
+<!--   
+   Change History:
+   Date        UserId         Description
+   11/20/2012  gkuo           new nopassclient
+-->
+
+<web-app version="3.0" xmlns="http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/javaee"
+         xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
+         xsi:schemaLocation="http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/javaee 
+         http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/javaee/web-app_3_0.xsd">
+    <display-name>NoPass UsernameToken Client</display-name>
+
+    <servlet id="Servlet_1">
+        <servlet-name>nopassclient</servlet-name>
+        <display-name>nopassclient</display-name>
+        <description>CXF NoPass token Service Client</description>
+        <servlet-class>com.ibm.ws.wssecurity.fat.nopassclient.CxfNoPassSvcClient</servlet-class>
+        <load-on-startup>1</load-on-startup>
+    </servlet>
+
+    <servlet-mapping id="ServletMapping_1">
+        <servlet-name>nopassclient</servlet-name>
+        <url-pattern>/CxfNoPassSvcClient</url-pattern>
+    </servlet-mapping>
+    
+    <session-config>
+        <session-timeout>60</session-timeout>
+    </session-config>
+
+</web-app>
+
